text_block_list.text:
Gold City declared that she would quit being a model. She is also 
working on practice today… but as it is.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …I lost speed at the last leg again. What is it, this…?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I even quit modeling and chose this path…! 
Trainer! Practice menu, make it tougher!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh!? What are you saying? I can still go onー
choice_data_list: A change of pace is also important!
A change of pace is also important!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
W-What is it… You got a scary look… I got it, 
a rest. I just have to take a rest, right!

When I was walking around the city on my holiday, 
I saw Gold City at an open cafe.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Sigh

Gold City was checking her smartphone in a ridiculous manner. 
When I tried to leave the place quietly, I got called.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Did you think I didn’t notice you? Sneaking 
around, while imitating this hot aura.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: This? Ah… I was looking at old photos.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Record of exercises and meals. And… the ones I took in for work. 
The rest, doesn’t really matter to me anymore.
choice_data_list: It must be an important memory
It must be an important memory

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Not really? I’ve already erased them. I already 
dedicated myself to my first race!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
In spite of that, the record isn’t growing… In the end, I don’t 
know what to do with it or something.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Well, today is a change of pace! You have to 
go out with me too. With your anagement face, 
the annoying flirting guys won’t come by.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
However! For real, don't be like a guardian. 
Just shut up and follow me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: A boring movie…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
There were a lot of my favorite brands… But none 
of them really caught my attention… ah.
No matter where we went, Gold City’s reaction wasn’t good…

Suddenly, Gold City stopped. What was ahead of the line of sight, 
was a large copy of an advertising post.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ah…! No way! It’s natural for the menu to get in your line of 
sight. But, I can see the scenery like this too.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
If you retire, the next girl will come and replace 
you immediately. If you stop, you will be overtaken 
and disappear into the past…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
It’s cool, tough. I can’t believe I’m behind the camera… it’s 
just a stupid virtual image, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …I’m tired.
Gold City stopped suddenly.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Say something. You have something to say, right. Today, you 
were giving out such an atmosphere.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Shut up… another hot preaching? I’m not 
lost. I already threw away the past.
choice_data_list: And the pictures in your phone?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Huh? What is this? What are you talking about? How are the 
contents of my smartphone related right now?
choice_data_list: You had precious memories of your work or something, right?
You had precious memories of your work or something, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
……! Are… are you stupid or? I’ll erase 
them right away. I just want to run.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Why don’t I erase them here right now? I don’t need them anyway!
Gold City took out her smartphone and opened the album app.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: These pictures…! Are annoying…! Really…
choice_data_list: Can I see them for a moment?
Can I see them for a moment?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: No peeping!…After all, it’s okay. If it’s just a little.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…This is the day when I was first seen on a TV camera. This 
face has too much energy… how funny.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
This is my first CM shooting. My reputation was good. This is the 
first time I cried at a failure… don’t look. Forget it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
This is… it was the first time I took a picture with a fan. She 
said my dream is to become a designer, and have me wear her work…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
choice_data_list: None of them are virtual images

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Shut up! Okay, don’t say anything meaningless! 
I’ll erase all of this!!

A supple finger slips through the screen, tapping a full photo 
selection. And then, into the trashー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Er, a… se… ……
Gold City’s fingers stopped.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
What is this… I’ve already decided to throw it away… If I don’t 
do that, I won’t be able to run decently…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But, why… while I’m running… I get reminded…!?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Even during practice! And running! It’s like 
a hole in my chest… I can’t let it go…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Let me throw it away… Let me throw it away, please…!
choice_data_list: You don’t have to abandon yourself
You don’t have to abandon yourself

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, ahaha… dummy. This is the 2nd time you’ve 
said that, ah… Don’t repeat the same thing, 
dummy. I don’t know anymore, dummy…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: No way…! I can’t do it…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
……! What is it? I made up my mind. Are you going 
to become my partner!? It’s too confusing!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You look! A little help! Break it! This troublesome 
attitude, it’s time to stop it…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Dummy. dummy, dummy, dummy. Stubborn. Clumsy. Meany.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ah… For real, what is your deal? Ahaha… My trainer…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …I wonder if there is a way to do both.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: That’s right. We need to try to find a way before giving up…
choice_data_list: Let’s take one step at a time and find the answer.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Dummy. shouldn’t I run and find and look for it?…Ah. First I 
need to apologize to the management.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! When I imagined it, I was able to laugh. Are you 
apologizing for me, even though I caused the commotion?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I’m glad with your feelings alone … I need to 
apologize by myself. And tell. For a while, I’m 
going to race and model with my legs!
